text: waltzmu alwafa' bikuli eahid awjbtmwh ealaa 'anfusakum baynakum wabayn allah -teala- 'aw baynakum wabayn alnaas fima la yukhalif kitab allah wsnt nbyh, wala trjeu fi al'ayman baed 'an akkadtmwha, waqad jaealtum allah ealaykum kafilana wdamnana hin eahdtmwh.
